EmailTemplate.subject: Billing Software Group Training in Charlotte, NC on July 17-18, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Charlotte, NC | July 17-18, 2012 Billing Software Group Training in Your Area
One of the best ways to improve your knowledge and skills of your Billing Software is through hands-on group training. Regular training not only helps your billers learn how to use the software more effectively and efficiently, but often also helps your service become more profitable.
DATE: July 17-18, 2012 (2 full days of training) HOSTS: MEDIC-Mecklenburg EMS (Charlotte, NC) COSTS: $500 SAMPLE AGENDA: <link to updated agenda>
REGISTER: http://offers.tritech.com/SGTNC085_July17-18_2012_Registration.html
This course has been approved by the National Academy of Ambulance Coding (NAACâ„¢) for 11.0 continuing education units
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
